definition: band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise
bad/spoiled/broken/to break down/(suffix) to the utmost

sentences.english: You're here to corrupt one of my brightest and best.
sentences.chinese: 你来这里是想带坏我最聪明和最好的学生。

sentences.english: The boy was ledastray by bad companions.
sentences.chinese: 男孩交了坏朋友而给带坏了。

sentences.english: Do not be led astray by it.
Yes, I can. and I see a movie.
sentences.chinese: 你可以带坏的手表去看电影吗？

sentences.english: The boy was led astray by bad companions.
sentences.chinese: 这个男孩被坏朋友带坏了。

sentences.english: The judge thought he'd been led astray by older children.
sentences.chinese: 法官认为他已经被那些年长的孩子们带坏了。

sentences.english: Jack was led astray by bad companions.
He is a good boy, but was misled by bad companions.
sentences.chinese: 他是个好孩子，但坏伙伴们把他带坏了。

definition: to follow bad examples/to be corrupted by bad examples
to make a mess/to mess with/to be wild/to sleep around/to jump into bed
lit. to pull sb into the water/to involve sb in a messy business/to get sb into trouble
lit. If the upper beam is not straight, the lower beam will be crooked (idiom); fig. subordinates imitate their superiors' vices
pinyin: shang4 liang2 bu4 zheng4 xia4 liang2 wai1

definition: to infuriate/to be furious/to die from an excess of anger
to make a scene/to fool around/to behave foolishly
to waste/to defile/to abuse/to insult/to defile/to trample on/to wreck/also pr. [zao1 ta5]
those who handle cinnabar are stained red; those who work with ink are stained black (idiom)/you are the product of your environment
pinyin: jin4 zhu1 zhe3 chi4 , jin4 mo4 zhe3 hei1
